org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.servlet

Class GadgetSpecServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.shindig.common.servlet.InjectedServlet
          • org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.servlet.ExplorerInjectedServlet
            • org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.servlet.GadgetSpecServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class GadgetSpecServlet
extends ExplorerInjectedServlet
    A servlet used for accessing and manipulating GadgetSpec objects in the GadgetRegistry. 
     GET /gadgetspec/specTree
 - Returns a JSON representation of the GadgetRegistry. 
 - @see GadgetRegistry.getSpecTree()
 
 GET /gadgetspec/default
 - Returns a JSON representation of the default GadgetSpec
 - @see GadgetRegistry.getDefaultGadget()
 
 GET /gadgetspec/{id}[/{resource}]
 - If no {resource} name is provided, this returns a JSON representation of the GadgetSpec whose ID is {id}
 - If a {resource} name is provided, this returns the resource given by {resource} for the GadgetSpec whose ID is {id}
 
 POST /gadgetspec
 - Creates a new temporary GadgetSpec with from the JSON POST data.
 - @see TempGadgetSpec
 - @see doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • doPost

        protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      IOException
        Servlet to POST a gadget to the server so it can be served back up and rendered. The POST body should be JSON and be modeled after the following sample. 
         { 
  "cssResources":[ 
    {
      "content":, 
      "name": 
    } 
  ], 
  "jsResources":[ 
    {
      "content":, 
      "name": 
    } 
  ], 
  "gadgetResource":{
    "content":, 
    "name": 
  }, 
  "htmlResources":[ 
    {
      "content":, 
      "name": 
    } 
  ] 
 }
        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        IOException
